sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: At least 70 people are predicted dead in Mayfield, Kentucky, after the most devastating tornado event in the state's history.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Protests against COVID-19 policies and vaccination take place in the Austrian and Spanish capitals.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Jeff Bezos' rocket company has successfully completed its third expedition.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: NFL superstar Michael Stratton joined five others on the 10-minute flight.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: At least 70 people are feared dead in the state of Kentucky.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: This announcement comes after more than 30 tornadoes ripped through half a dozen U.S. states on Friday night and Saturday morning.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Mayfield, home to some 10,000 people in Graves County, has been left for ruin. In a tweet US President Joe Biden offered his condolences saying to lose a loved one in a storm like this is an unimaginable tragedy while Kentucky's governor has declared a state of emergency. This has been the most devastating tornado event in our state's history.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: And for those that have seen it, what it's done here in Graves County and elsewhere, it is indescribable. The level of devastation is unlike anything I have ever seen.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: station is unlike anything I have ever seen. You see parts of industrial buildings, roofs or sidings in trees if trees are lucky enough to stand." The Federal Emergency Management Agency and rescue workers in Mayfield are continuing to search for survivors in a collapsed candle factory. While the total loss of life remains to be seen, weather conditions are set to improve as the weekend continues.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Thousands of demonstrators gathered in the centre of Vienna again on Saturday to denounce mandatory vaccination against Covid-19 and confinement for those who refuse.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Protests about the jab have taken place every weekend for several weeks now.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: This week the government announced the details of the vaccination law that will come into effect from February.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: All Austrian residents over the age of 14 are expected to be vaccinated unless exempt for health reasons.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Vaccination won't be imposed by force, but non-vaccinated people will be fined.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The protests come ahead of the end of confinement for the vaccinated on Sunday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: And in Spain, similar gatherings took place in Madrid.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Demonstrators weren't protesting compulsory Covid vaccination, as Austria will be the first European country to take this step.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: But they are against the government's coronavirus policies.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Spain overall has a high vaccination rate.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Infections have risen there, but medical services are coping.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Any invasion by Russia would be a strategic mistake for which there would be serious consequences.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: That's according to the British Foreign Secretary, Liz Truss, and her UK counterpart, Anthony Blinken.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The UK has welcomed top diplomats from the world's wealthiest nations to Liverpool to discuss the build-up of Russian troops and weapons on Ukraine's border.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: And of course the G7 countries, as the world's leading democracies and economies, need to come together to advance the frontiers of freedom.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: We need to show a positive, proactive approach in making ourselves safer, more competitive and better able to stand up for the values we believe in. We need to defend ourselves against the growing threats from hostile actors. Trusts also urge free democratic nations not to rely on Russian gas supplies such as the Nord Stream 2 pipeline. Foreign ministers will also discuss the coronavirus vaccination campaign during the two-day meeting.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The Bosnian Serb parliament adopted a declaration on Friday

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: that will weaken the war-ravaged Balkan country's central authority.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Lawmakers vote on starting a procedure for Bosnian Serbs to withdraw from the Bosnian army, security services, tax system and judiciary.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The Bosnian Serb member of the tripartite Bosnian presidency, Milorad Dodik, said it was a historic parliament session that would strengthen the Bosnian Serb mini-state formed as part of a US-sponsored peace agreement that ended the Bosnian war in 1995. Despite the fact that it is highly unlikely that the announced changes will come into effect any time soon, there is a fear that the current rhetoric and moves made by the authorities in Republika Srpska could push Bosnia into an even deeper crisis.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: During a ceremony, a member of the Bosnian presidency warned that Dodik's policies are taking the wrong path and called on the US and the EU to crack down on him and his associates.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The United States has already imposed a travel ban and other sanctions on Dodik, and both American and German officials have recently threatened more in case Bosnian subs further weaken Bosnia's central institutions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Environmental protesters in Belgrade have blocked roads for a third consecutive weekend.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: For now, the government has abandoned legislation that would enable foreign companies mine lithium, further polluting western Serbia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: However, critics say the ruling conservatives need to abolish all future lithium excavation projects.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Protesters fear the authorities will inevitably prioritise foreign investment over environmental concerns.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Fans of the late Lina Wertmuller have gathered in Piazza del Popolo in Rome to bid the film director a final farewell.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: A central figure in Italian cinema, Werdm√ºller died earlier this week.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: As the first woman to be nominated for an Academy Award in the Best Director category, she established a unique reputation for blending tragedy, farce, politics, and sex in her iconic pictures.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: NFL legend Michael Stratton has returned to Earth following a 10-minute space mission.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The former New York Giant joined five others aboard the New Shepard capsule, owned by Jeff Bezos' rocket company Blue Origin.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: This was the company's third passenger flight.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The founder of Amazon journeyed on the debut launch in July, while Star Trek actor William Shatner was welcomed on the second.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The reusable automated rocket is aptly named after Alan Shepard, the first American in space.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The astronaut's eldest daughter joined the Super Bowl star for Saturday's expedition.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Laura ShepChurchley packed a tiny piece of her father's Freedom 7 Mercury capsule, as well as a few other keepsakes from his Apollo 14 mission.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Whereas the ABC co-host brought a Super Bowl ring, his number 92 jersey and a football along for the ride.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Blue Origin originally planned the launch for Thursday, but high winds forced the crew to postpone.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Giant wave surfer Andrew Cotton has been saved from drowning by a fellow surfer.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The athlete fell from his board into the water at the Portuguese seaside town of Nazar√©, known for its huge waves. The Brit was trapped in the rocks at the foot of the town's iconic lighthouse when Brazilian surfer Marcelo Luna jet-skied out to release him.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The water was so aerated I was sort of sinking, so I pulled my unflectable vest and then there was like a moment there I was like, okay, right, this is definitely the worst, you know, this isn't, this can go, This can go pretty bad.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Marcelo said he became aware of Cotton's distress when people started shouting.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Then he realized the Brit was stuck dangerously between the rocks and the wave breaks.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: This place in Nazar√© has always been a nightmare for us surfers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: We know that, we train hard so that it doesn't happen, but it can happen and it did.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: But I'm happy because I was there.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Nazar√© is one of the world's top spots for giant wave surfing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: It is also notorious for how dangerous the waves can be.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: As Luna says, what matters is not the surfing, but getting all the surfers home safe.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Composed of iconic photographs and new unpublished works, McCurry's images are known for their humanity, dignity, compassion, elegance and proportion.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The exhibition in Mayol Museum in Paris takes us on a long journey from Afghanistan to Southeast Asia and from Africa to Latin America.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: This vast and fascinating body of work always retains the human element that made his celebrated image of the Afghan girl so powerful.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Across from the Kremlin on the banks of the Moskva River, a century-old power plant is transformed by a billionaire gas tycoon into a temple of contemporary art in Moscow and Russia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The vast interior, more than 35,000 square meters, has both enormous and intimate spaces for exhibitions and events.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The GES2 art center was designed by star Italian architect Renzo Piano and promises to house the biggest international names as well as Russian rising stars.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The Museo Tisn-Bornemisza presents until January 30th the first retrospective devoted to Ren√© Magritte to be held in Madrid since 1989. With more than 70 works, including paintings and works on paper along with a selection of photographs and films, the exhibition emphasizes the repetitive element present in the work of the great surrealist painter, whose obsessive themes constantly reappear with innumerable variations.
